body:
Branch updated.

![screen shot 02-15-15 at 01 49 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1732773/6201618/0b6f31f4-b4b5-11e4-911f-7ad44d30c8e2.PNG)

TODO:
- [x] use Tomsons26's TS logos
- [x] fix the vertical powerbar not being correctly repeated
- [x] fix these (order buttons) symbols overlapping the production icons
- [x] fix the radar: strangely, its width is half the correct dimensions (see https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/7474#issuecomment-74406073)
- [x] fix the scroll up and scroll down buttons (and use the other artwork for these buttons)
- [x] align Order and Production buttons correctly
- [x] rework the artwork behind the Timer, Cash & Power values
- [ ] ~~change font color for Timer, Cash & Power? or add a 1px drop down shadow?~~
We shouldn't have a powerbar and a digital readout.
That's what was planned for the D2K UI.. both..

Oh, sweet logo. (isn't GDI's a bit small?)
I don't care about the number indicator. We **need** the power bar!
But there would probably be some time between the UI getting merged and someone making the power bar work (and not just be a placeholder), so both should be OK for now.

P.S.: I think the repair, sell and power down buttons should be grouped, and either be in the center or the the 3 left-most buttons.

I don't think you will be able to fix the radar. It is one of the things on the bucket list https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/5350 as the minimap is not yet adapted properly to the isometric perspective. Just make the Nod logo a bit smaller to compensate for now.
This is looking great! (except for the d2k build palette icons being all over the place)
I'm not a fan of using the GDI sidebar with a Nod logo for Nod.  We will need to build a proper nod themed version too.
Yes, but not now.
:-1: to that. History shows that it will then never (within a reasonable timeframe) happen.
Whatever. This builds upon https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7461 so that can go first anyway.

Branch updated (once more):
![screen shot 02-15-15 at 12 24 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1732773/6203114/73605fe0-b50f-11e4-9222-4b065f64dcc9.PNG)
Nice. Only the aircraft and defense queue left to do and the trike symbol needs to replaced by a tank.
There is also some empty space by the scroll buttons, I wonder what we could add there to reuse the portion of the screen occupied by the UI.

> Only the aircraft and defense queue left to do and the trike symbol needs to replaced by a tank.

Are these Production buttons required? I haven't enabled them yet but everything is ready.

> There is also some empty space by the scroll buttons, I wonder what we could add there to reuse the portion of the screen occupied by the UI.

I'll see what I can do with this empty space but we need to keep the UI pretty.

Here is what I've been working on during the last hours: 
![chrome](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1732773/6204301/3bc9e434-b546-11e4-9ee4-5bf3dab941f8.png)

Nice :+1: 
What is that cobra thing?

I believe that is a shp made by the Nod artist for TI from ppm.

I cannot remember how to spell his name.

Thanks to @pchote, I have been able to fix the Order buttons at the top (they were GDI before).

![screen shot 02-16-15 at 09 45 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1732773/6219101/c3c2feea-b625-11e4-9c90-06620296f99f.PNG)
:cool: That dark design really improves the mood of playing another faction.
i think we need something behind the nod logo in the radar box

Little by little, it's getting closer to completion. =) 
The vertical powerbars on this screenshot are fake (mockup), the rest is already in my branch (and playable).

![screen shot 02-17-15 at 10 19 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1732773/6237906/fcbd3bda-b6f6-11e4-9007-95769b210820.PNG)

TODO list: 
- [x] fix the scroll up and scroll down buttons (they don't change when clicked)
- [ ] ~~observer UI not done yet.. (openra crashes if you win a game and creates a huge debug.log file) ==> it seems to be a bug with TS itself, not the UI~~
- [x] the NOD UI still uses the GDI order symbols
- [x] chrome.yaml features production-icons: chrome.png, production-icons-nod: chrome.png, production-icons-gdi: chrome.png (same for order-icons: chrome.png, order-icons-nod: chrome.png and order-icons-gdi: chrome.png). I am not sure all these paragraphs are useful.
- [x] align the vertical midline of the scroll triangle graphics with the vertical lines separating the palette columns
- [x] move all units from Vehicles to Tanks (I have tried for 45mn, I failed.. Someone else will have to do it)
- [x] create new artwork for all buttons states: normal, hover, pressed, highlighted, highlighted hover, highlighted pressed, disabled, highlighted disabled
- [ ] make sidebar-bits and power-icons AddRaceSuffixLogic compatible (so  sidebar-bits-gdi / sidebar-bits-nod and power-icons-gdi / power-icons-nod)
I would like to see the vertical midline of the scroll triangle graphics line up with the vertical lines separating the palette columns.
done.

The top of the interface where the power and cash is looks a bit cluttered, could easily be fixed with some extra padding in the UI.
I would also be interested in seeing the scroll buttons aligned the the right of the UI.
Now that https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7461 is merged, you can start preparing a pull request.

My branch is still broken (and not all remaining tasks have been completed, check my TODO list above). https://github.com/x-a-n-a-x/OpenRA/commits/new-TS-UI

Current error: Exception of type `System.ArgumentException`: Sprite / was not found.

I made some comments on https://github.com/x-a-n-a-x/OpenRA/commit/1e5b8cbf1a06a5b596b1cb53c90fb02e43152a42.

> move all units from Vehicles to Tanks

Why? Just replace the Dune trike icon with something more generic.
Because the original had all vehicles/tanks in one queue, so @x-a-n-a-x please continue with that.
I filed https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7574 as @x-a-n-a-x seems to need help again.

Update : I have retried to fix the errors I had for the TS UI and I think it's a success. 
If you want, you can test https://github.com/x-a-n-a-x/OpenRA/tree/new-TS-build-palette-skin

I don't consider the UI ready yet, I would like to tweak it more.
